meanings.definition: Dirty, grimy, or unkempt in appearance
meanings.sent1: The alley behind the restaurant was the grungiest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud, my clothes were the grungiest they had ever been.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked cleaner than the grungiest old rug in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her hands were the grungiest, as if she had been digging in the dirt all day.
meanings.sent5: The grungiest corner of the garage was where spiders liked to hide.

meanings.definition: Worn-out or shabby in style or condition
meanings.sent1: The grungiest sneakers I owned were falling apart at the seams.
meanings.sent2: The old car in the junkyard was the grungiest vehicle I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: His grungiest shirt had more holes than fabric left.
meanings.sent4: The grungiest book on the shelf looked like it had been read a thousand times.
meanings.sent5: The grungiest chair in the waiting room was held together with duct tape.
